description.wurst.altmanager.checked: The password has worked in the past.
description.wurst.altmanager.cracked: This alt has no password and will only work on cracked servers.
description.wurst.altmanager.failed: Last time you tried to log in with this alt, it didn't work.
description.wurst.altmanager.favorite: You have marked this alt as one of your favorites.
description.wurst.altmanager.premium: This alt has a password and can join all servers.
description.wurst.altmanager.unchecked: You have never successfully logged in with this alt.
description.wurst.altmanager.window_free: It might look like the game is not responding while that window is open.
description.wurst.hack.aimassist: Helps you aim at nearby entities.
description.wurst.hack.airplace: Allows you to place blocks in mid-air.
description.wurst.hack.anchoraura: Automatically places (optional), charges, and detonates respawn anchors to kill entities around you.
description.wurst.hack.antiafk: Walks around randomly to hide you from AFK detectors.
description.wurst.hack.antiblind:
Prevents blindness and darkness effects.
Incompatible with OptiFine.
description.wurst.hack.antidrop: Prevents you from dropping the selected items by accident. Defaults to all weapons, tools, and shulker boxes.
description.wurst.hack.antientitypush: Prevents you from getting pushed by players and mobs.
description.wurst.hack.antiblast: Reduces or reverses knockback from explosions, wind charges, and other blast-based sources.
description.wurst.hack.antihunger:
Slows down your hunger when you are walking.

??c??lWARNING:??r There have been reports of this hack causing you to take extra fall damage under specific, unknown conditions.
description.wurst.hack.antiknockback: Prevents you from taking knockback from players and mobs.
description.wurst.hack.antisocial: Automatically disconnects the moment PlayerESP spots someone entering your range, perfect for hiding while AFK farming.
description.wurst.hack.antispam: Blocks chat spam by adding a counter to repeated messages.
description.wurst.hack.antiwaterpush: Prevents you from getting pushed by water.
description.wurst.hack.antiwobble: Disables the wobble effect caused by nausea and portals.
description.wurst.hack.arrowdmg:
Massively increases arrow damage, but also consumes a lot of hunger and reduces accuracy.

Does not work with crossbows and seems to be patched on Paper servers.
description.wurst.hack.autobuild:
Builds things automatically.
Place a single block to start building.
description.wurst.hack.autocomplete: Auto-completes your chat messages using large language models. Requires an OpenAI account with API access or any other language model API that is OpenAI-compatible.
description.wurst.hack.autodisenchant: Automatically feeds every inventory item into the grindstone to remove enchantments. Enable the setting to include your hotbar.
description.wurst.hack.autofish: Automatically catches fish using your best fishing rod. If it finds a better rod while fishing, it will automatically switch to it.
description.wurst.hack.autoleave: Automatically leaves the server when your health is low.
description.wurst.hack.autolibrarian: Automatically trains a villager to become a librarian that sells a specific enchanted book. You can set up an entire trading hall in no time by using this hack.
description.wurst.hack.automace: Automatically equips your mace while falling and times the hit for the slam bonus. Includes options for targets, delays, and switching back.
description.wurst.hack.automine: Automatically mines any block that you look at.
description.wurst.hack.autopotion: Automatically throws splash potions of instant health when your health is low.
description.wurst.hack.autoreconnect: Automatically reconnects when you get kicked from the server.
description.wurst.hack.autorespawn: Automatically respawns you whenever you die.
description.wurst.hack.offlinesettings: Offers offline server detection, quick reconnect and other offline server abilities.
description.wurst.hack.autosign: Instantly writes whatever text you want on every sign you place or edit. Once activated, you can write normally on the first sign to specify the text for all other signs.
description.wurst.hack.autosoup:
Automatically eats soup when your health is low.

??lNote:??r This hack ignores hunger and assumes that eating soup directly refills your health. If the server you are playing on is not configured to do that, use AutoEat instead.
description.wurst.hack.autosteal: Automatically steals everything from all chests and shulker boxes that you open.
description.wurst.hack.autoswitch:
Switches the item in your hand all the time.

??lProTip:??r Use this in combination with BuildRandom while having a lot of different colored wool or concrete blocks in your hotbar.
description.wurst.hack.autosword:
Automatically uses the best weapon in your hotbar to attack entities.
Tip: This works with Killaura.
description.wurst.hack.autotool: Automatically equips the fastest applicable tool in your hotbar when you try to break a block.
description.wurst.hack.autototem: Automatically moves totems of undying to your off-hand.
description.wurst.hack.autotrader: Automatically sells selected items to villagers and merchants. Detects matching trades and performs purchases while moving results into your inventory to avoid cursor-stalls.
description.wurst.hack.barrieresp: Allows you to see nearby barrier blocks.
description.wurst.hack.basefinder:
Finds player bases by searching for man-made blocks.
The blocks that it finds will be highlighted in the selected color.
Good for finding faction bases.
description.wurst.hack.beaconexploit: Intercepts beacon packets and spoofs your chosen primary and secondary effects so you can request buffs like Regen II even without upgrading the beacon properly.
description.wurst.hack.blink: Suspends all motion updates while enabled.
description.wurst.hack.boatfly:
Allows you to fly with boats and other vehicles.
Press the sprint key to go down faster.
description.wurst.hack.bonemealaura:
Automatically uses bone meal on specific types of plants.
Use the checkboxes to specify the types of plants.
description.wurst.hack.bowaimbot: Automatically aims your bow or crossbow.
description.wurst.hack.breadcrumbs: Draws a trail behind you so you can see where you have been.
description.wurst.hack.cameradistance: Allows you to change the camera distance in 3rd person.
description.wurst.hack.cameranoclip: Allows the camera in 3rd person to go through walls.
description.wurst.hack.cavefinder: Helps you to find caves by highlighting them in the selected color.
description.wurst.hack.chattranslator: Translates chat messages using Google Translate.
description.wurst.hack.cheatdetector: Monitors nearby players and reports suspicious movement or combat patterns in chat.
description.wurst.hack.chestsearch: Scans opened chests for items and highlights matching chests with waypoints and ESP.
description.wurst.hack.lootsearch: Loads SeedMapper loot export files for the current server and displays the discovered chest locations and contents in a searchable list. Adds temporary waypoints to track loot positions. Use SeedMapper to export loot into the "seedmapper/loot" folder before using this feature.
description.wurst.hack.clickaura:
Automatically attacks the closest valid entity whenever you click.

??c??lWARNING:??r ClickAuras generally look more suspicious than Killauras and are easier for plugins to detect. It is recommended to use Killaura or TriggerBot instead.
description.wurst.hack.crashchest:
Generates a chest that essentially bans people from the server if they have too many copies of it in their inventory. ??c??lWARNING:??r ??cThis cannot be undone. Use with caution!??r

If copies are instead placed in a chest, anyone who opens the chest will be kicked from the server (just once).
description.wurst.hack.creativeflight:
Allows you to fly like in Creative Mode.

??c??lWARNING:??r You will take fall damage if you don't use NoFall.
description.wurst.hack.criticals: Changes all your hits to critical hits.
description.wurst.hack.crystalaura: Automatically places (optional) and detonates end crystals to kill entities around you.
description.wurst.hack.derp:
Randomly moves your head around.
Only visible to other players.
description.wurst.hack.dolphin:
Makes you bob up in water automatically.
(just like a dolphin)
description.wurst.hack.enchantmenthandle: Overlays chest GUIs with a breakdown of enchanted armor and weapons inside, grouped by slot or weapon type with quick take and take-all buttons.
description.wurst.hack.excavator: Automatically breaks all blocks in the selected area.
description.wurst.hack.extraelytra: Makes the Elytra easier to use.
description.wurst.hack.fancychat:
Replaces ASCII characters in sent chat messages with fancier unicode characters. Can be used to bypass curse word filters on some servers.
Does not work on servers that block unicode characters.
description.wurst.hack.fastbreak:
Allows you to break blocks faster.
Tip: This works with Nuker.
description.wurst.hack.fastladder: Allows you to climb up ladders faster.
description.wurst.hack.fastplace:
Allows you to place blocks 5 times faster.
Tip: This can speed up other hacks like AutoBuild.
description.wurst.hack.fightbot:
A bot that automatically walks around and kills everything.
Good for MobArena.
description.wurst.hack.fish: Disables underwater gravity so you can swim like a fish.
description.wurst.hack.flight:
Allows you to fly.

??c??lWARNING:??r You will take fall damage if you don't use NoFall.
description.wurst.hack.follow:
A bot that follows the closest entity.
Very annoying.

Use .follow to follow a specific entity.
description.wurst.hack.forceop:
Cracks AuthMe passwords.
Can be used to get OP.
description.wurst.hack.freecam: Allows you to move the camera without moving your character.
description.wurst.hack.fullbright: Allows you to see in the dark.
description.wurst.hack.glide:
Makes you glide down slowly when falling.

??c??lWARNING:??r You will take fall damage if you don't use NoFall.
description.wurst.hack.globaltoggle: Controls global overrides for sticky areas and above-ground ESP filters.
description.wurst.hack.handnoclip: Allows you to reach specific blocks through walls.
description.wurst.hack.headroll:
Makes you nod all the time.
Only visible to other players.
description.wurst.hack.healthtags: Shows the health of players in their nametags.
description.wurst.hack.highjump:
Allows you to jump higher.

??c??lWARNING:??r You will take fall damage if you don't use NoFall.
description.wurst.hack.infinichat:
Removes the 256 character limit from the chat.
Useful for long commands that modify NBT data.

??6??lNOTICE:??r Not recommended for talking to people. Most servers will cut messages to 256 characters on their end.
description.wurst.hack.instabuild:
Similar to AutoBuild, but tries to build the entire template in one tick.
Only works with very simple templates.
description.wurst.hack.instantbunker: Builds a small bunker around you. Needs 57 blocks.
description.wurst.hack.invwalk: Allows you to move around while the inventory is open.
description.wurst.hack.itemgenerator:
Generates random items and drops them on the ground.
??oCreative mode only.??r
description.wurst.hack.jesus:
Allows you to walk on water.
Jesus used this hack ~2000 years ago.
description.wurst.hack.jetpack:
Allows you to fly as if you had a jetpack.

??c??lWARNING:??r You will take fall damage if you don't use NoFall.
description.wurst.hack.kaboom:
Breaks blocks around you like an explosion.

Can be a lot faster than Nuker if the server doesn't have an anti-cheat plugin. It works best with fast tools and weak blocks.

Note: This is not an actual explosion.
description.wurst.hack.killauralegit:
Slower Killaura that is harder to detect.
Not required on normal NoCheat+ servers!
description.wurst.hack.killpotion:
Generates a potion that can kill almost anything, including players in Creative mode. Does not work on undead mobs, since they are already dead.

Requires Creative mode.
description.wurst.hack.lavawateresp: Highlights only lava and water blocks.
description.wurst.hack.liquids: Allows you to place blocks in liquids.
description.wurst.hack.logoutspots: Shows the locations where players logged out.
description.wurst.hack.macedmg: Increases your damage when attacking with a mace.
description.wurst.hack.spearassist: Adds configurable spear charge boosts, highlights distant targets, and can keep AimAssist active.
description.wurst.hack.masstpa: Sends a TPA request to all players.
description.wurst.hack.mobsearch: Helps you to find specific mobs by highlighting them in rainbow or fixed color. Use the Query input to search for partial keywords or create a list of mobs to highlight.
description.wurst.hack.mobspawnesp: Highlights areas where mobs can spawn.
description.wurst.hack.multiaura: Faster Killaura that attacks multiple entities at once.
description.wurst.hack.nametags: Changes the scale of the nametags so you can always read them. Also allows you to see the nametags of sneaking players.
description.wurst.hack.navigator: A searchable GUI that learns your preferences over time.
description.wurst.hack.newchunks: Highlights newly generated chunks around you.
description.wurst.hack.nobackground: Removes the dark background behind inventories.
description.wurst.hack.noclip:
Allows you to freely move through blocks.
A block (e.g. sand) must fall on your head to activate it.

??c??lWARNING:??r You will take damage while moving through blocks!
description.wurst.hack.nocomcrash:
Lags and crashes servers using the Nocom exploit.
Does not work on Paper servers. Tested working on Vanilla, Spigot, and Fabric. Can be disabled by some AntiCheats.
description.wurst.hack.nofireoverlay:
Blocks the overlay when you are on fire.

??c??lWARNING:??r This can cause you to burn to death without noticing.
description.wurst.hack.nofog: Removes distance fog from the world.
description.wurst.hack.nohurtcam: Disables the shaking effect when you get hurt.
description.wurst.hack.nolevitation:
Disables the levitation effect when you get hit by a Shulker.

??c??lWARNING:??r You will fall if you activate this while the levitation effect is already active!
description.wurst.hack.nooverlay: Blocks the overlays of water, lava, and powder snow.
description.wurst.hack.nopumpkin: Blocks the overlay when wearing a pumpkin on your head.
description.wurst.hack.noshieldoverlay: Lowers the shield so it covers less of your screen.
description.wurst.hack.noslowdown: Cancels slowness effects caused by honey, soul sand and using items.
description.wurst.hack.novignette: Removes the vignette effect (darkening of the screen edges).
description.wurst.hack.noweather: Allows you to alter the client-side weather, time and moon phase.
description.wurst.hack.noweb: Prevents you from getting slowed down by cobwebs.
description.wurst.hack.nukerlegit:
Slower Nuker that's much harder for anti-cheat plugins to detect.
Not required on normal NoCheat+ servers!
description.wurst.hack.openwateresp: Shows whether or not you are fishing in 'open water' and draws a box around the area used for the open water calculation.
description.wurst.hack.overlay: Renders the Nuker animation whenever you mine a block.
description.wurst.hack.panic:
Instantly turns off all enabled hacks.
Be careful with this one!
description.wurst.hack.parkour:
Makes you jump automatically when reaching the edge of a block.
Useful for parkours and jump'n'runs.
description.wurst.hack.playeresp:
Highlights nearby players.
ESP boxes of friends will appear in blue.
description.wurst.hack.portalgui: Allows you to open GUIs in portals.
description.wurst.hack.potionsaver: Freezes all potion effects while you are standing still.
description.wurst.hack.prophuntesp:
Allows you to see fake blocks in Prophunt.
Made for Mineplex Prophunt. Might not work on other servers.
description.wurst.hack.protect:
A bot that follows the closest entity and protects it from other entities.
Use .protect to protect a specific entity instead of the closest one.
description.wurst.hack.quickshulker: Drops a shulker box beside you, moves the filtered items from your inventory or the currently opened container into it, and picks it back up so inventory cleanup only takes one click.
description.wurst.hack.radar:
Shows the location of nearby entities.
??cred??r - players
??6orange??r - monsters
??agreen??r - animals
??7gray??r - others
description.wurst.hack.remoteview:
Allows you to see the world as someone else.
Use the .rv command to make it target a specific entity.
description.wurst.hack.restock: Automatically restocks your hand with the selected items from your inventory. Works better with FastPlace.
description.wurst.hack.safetp: Activates Blink for five seconds and sends your teleport command move and attack while the teleport countdown is running
description.wurst.hack.safewalk: Prevents you from falling off edges.
description.wurst.hack.scaffoldwalk: Automatically places blocks below your feet.
description.wurst.hack.search: Helps you to find specific blocks by highlighting them in rainbow or fixed color. Use the Query input to search for partial keywords or create your own list of blocks to highlight.
description.wurst.hack.seedmapperhelper: Builds and runs SeedMapper sm:* commands from a button-based interface whenever the SeedMapper mod is installed, including highlight, locate, sample, and source helpers.
description.wurst.hack.signframept: Right-clicking item frames (with items in them) or signs forwards the interaction to the block behind them. Use the hack settings to enable Frames, Signs, or both. Hold sneak to interact with the frame or sign normally.
description.wurst.hack.skinderp: Randomly toggles parts of your skin.
description.wurst.hack.snowshoe: Allows you to walk on powder snow.
description.wurst.hack.speedhack:
Allows you to run ~2.5x faster than you would by sprinting and jumping.

??6??lWARNING:??r Patched in NoCheat+ version 3.13.2. Will only bypass older versions of NoCheat+.
Type ??l/ncp version??r to check a server's NoCheat+ version.
description.wurst.hack.speednuker: Faster version of Nuker that cannot bypass NoCheat+.
description.wurst.hack.spider: Allows you to climb up walls like a spider.
description.wurst.hack.step: Allows you to step up full blocks.
description.wurst.hack.surfacexray: Makes the exposed surface of tracked fluids like lava or water partially transparent while clearing the matching volume underneath. Add any block IDs you want to extend the effect.
description.wurst.hack.targetplace: Select a block by pressing P, when that block is broken or destroyed (turned to air) it is automatically replaced with the block you're holding and it will be orientated down. This works from a distance as well.
description.wurst.hack.templatetool: Allows you to create custom templates for AutoBuild by scanning existing buildings.
description.wurst.hack.throw:
Uses an item multiple times. Can be used to throw snowballs and eggs, spawn mobs, place minecarts, etc. in very large quantities.

This can cause a lot of lag and even crash a server.
description.wurst.hack.tillaura:
Automatically turns dirt, grass, etc. into farmland.
Not to be confused with Killaura.
description.wurst.hack.timer: Changes the speed of almost everything.
description.wurst.hack.tired:
Makes you look like Alexander back in April 2015.
Only visible to other players.
description.wurst.hack.toomanyhax:
Blocks any features that you don't want.
Allows you to make sure that you don't accidentally enable the wrong hack and get banned for it.
For those who want to "only hack a little bit".

Use the ??6.toomanyhax??r command to choose which features to block.
Type ??6.help toomanyhax??r for more info.
description.wurst.hack.tp-aura: Automatically attacks the closest valid entity while teleporting around it.
description.wurst.hack.trajectories: Predicts the flight path of arrows and throwable items.
description.wurst.hack.treebot:
An experimental bot that automatically walks around and chops down trees.
Limited to small trees for now.
description.wurst.hack.trialspawneresp: Highlights trial spawners with ESP boxes, tracer lines, overlays for mob type, waves, cooldowns, activation radius hints, and optional Trial Vault linking.
description.wurst.hack.outreach: Attacks the entity under your crosshair even when blocks are in the way, respecting your configured range and FOV.
description.wurst.hack.triggerbot: Automatically attacks the entity you're looking at.
description.wurst.hack.trollpotion: Generates a potion with many annoying effects on it.
description.wurst.hack.truesight: Allows you to see invisible entities.
description.wurst.hack.tunneller:
Automatically digs a tunnel.

??c??lWARNING:??r Although this bot will try to avoid lava and other dangers, there is no guarantee that it won't die. Only send it out with gear that you don't mind losing.
description.wurst.hack.veinminer: Automatically mines ore veins for you.
description.wurst.hack.waypoints: Allows you to set waypoints in the world and see them on screen. Includes player death locations.
description.wurst.hack.windchargekey: Throws wind charges when you press a chosen key. Supports silent switching, custom delays, and optional auto-jump for extra momentum.
description.wurst.hack.x-ray: Allows you to see ores through walls.
description.wurst.hack.xcarry: Keeps the 2x2 crafting grid items from being cleared when you close your inventory. Enable dangerous mode to cancel every close packet for more aggressive desyncs.
description.wurst.nochatreports.message_: This message has a valid signature and is thus vulnerable to fraudulent chat reports.
description.wurst.other_feature.nochatre:
Disables the cryptographic signatures that since 1.19 are attached to your chat messages.

??c??lWARNING: ??cIf ??cyou ??csend ??cchat ??cmessages ??cwith ??csignatures, ??cyour ??cMinecraft ??caccount ??ccan ??cget ??creported ??cand ??cglobally ??cbanned ??cfrom ??cmultiplayer!??r

Even if you only say harmless things in chat, your signed messages can be abused to create a fake chat report that gets your account banned unfairly.

If you have to re-enable chat signatures to chat on a server, consider playing on an alt account that you don't mind losing.
description.wurst.setting.aimassist.aim_: Keeps aiming at entities while you're blocking with a shield or using items.
hack.wurst.item_handler.description: UI for manually selecting dropped items to collect. Blocks automatic pickup.
description.wurst.hack.itemhandler: Provides a HUD and GUI for inspecting nearby dropped items, selecting which to pick or reject, tracing selected types in-world, and managing popup display and behavior.
description.wurst.setting.item_handler.r: Radius (meters) around the player's position where reject rules are applied.
Duration in seconds after which a reject rule expires.
description.wurst.setting.item_handler.s: When enabled, a HUD popup lists nearby dropped items.
Show the registry ID (like 'minecraft:stone') under the item name in the popup.
description.wurst.setting.item_handler.p: How far (meters) items must be to appear in the popup list.
(Use the slider's right end ∞ value to make the popup global)
description.wurst.setting.item_handler.h: Horizontal offset (pixels) for the HUD popup.
Vertical offset (pixels) for the HUD popup.
description.wurst.setting.item_handler.p: Scale for popup text and icon size. Increases readability at the cost of space.
Number of items to show in the popup list (1–10). Remaining items are summarized in the footer.
description.wurst.setting.item_handler.r: When enabled, hides items listed in ItemESP's ignored list from the HUD and GUI.
description.wurst.setting.item_handler.i: List of item IDs or keywords that should be hidden when respecting ItemESP ignores. Use the editor to add or remove entries.
description.wurst.setting.aimassist.chec: Won't aim at entities behind blocks.
description.wurst.setting.aimassist.fov:
Field Of View - how far away from your crosshair an entity can be before it's ignored.
360?? = aims at entities all around you.
description.wurst.setting.aimassist.igno: Ignores some of your mouse input while AimAssist is aiming. This makes it harder for you to accidentally aim away from the target.
description.wurst.setting.airplace.guide: Shows a guide for where blocks will be placed.
Color of the block placing guide, if enabled.
description.wurst.setting.anchoraura.aut:
When enabled, AnchorAura will automatically place anchors near valid entities.
When disabled, AnchorAura will only charge and detonate manually placed anchors.
description.wurst.setting.anchoraura.che:
Ensures that you don't reach through blocks when placing or right-clicking respawn anchors.

Slower but can help with anti-cheat plugins.
description.wurst.setting.anchoraura.fac:
Whether or not AnchorAura should face the correct direction when placing and right-clicking respawn anchors.

Slower but can help with anti-cheat plugins.
How AnchorAura should face the respawn anchors
description.wurst.setting.anchoraura.ran: Determines how far AnchorAura will reach to place, charge and detonate anchors.
description.wurst.setting.anchoraura.swi: How AnchorAura should swing your hand when placing, charging and detonating respawn anchors.
description.wurst.setting.anchoraura.tak: Where to look for respawn anchors and glowstone.
description.wurst.setting.antiafk.ai_ran: The area in which AntiAFK can move when Use AI is turned on.
description.wurst.setting.antiafk.non-ai:
The area in which AntiAFK can move when Use AI is turned off.

??c??lWARNING:??r This area must be completely unobstructed and free of hazards.
description.wurst.setting.antiafk.show_w: Displays the remaining wait time in the HackList.
description.wurst.setting.antiafk.use_ai:
Uses a pathfinding AI to move around naturally and avoid hazards.
Can sometimes get stuck.
description.wurst.setting.antiafk.wait_t: How much time can be randomly added or subtracted from the wait time, in seconds.
description.wurst.setting.arrowdmg.stren: Strength of the effect. 10 is the highest possible as of Minecraft 1.21.
description.wurst.setting.arrowdmg.tride:
When enabled, tridents fly much further. Doesn't seem to affect damage or Riptide.

??c??lWARNING:??r You can easily lose your trident by enabling this option!
description.wurst.setting.autoeat.allow_:
Eating chorus fruit teleports you to a random location.
Not recommended.

Rotten flesh applies a harmless "hunger" effect.
It is safe to eat and useful as emergency food.

Poisonous food applies damage over time.
Not recommended.
description.wurst.setting.autoeat.injure:
Fills the hunger bar to at least this level when you are injured, even if it wastes some hunger points.
10.0 - fastest healing
9.0 - slowest healing
<9.0 - no healing
<3.5 - no sprinting
description.wurst.setting.autoeat.injury: Prevents small injuries from wasting all your food. AutoEat will only consider you injured if you have lost at least this number of hearts.
description.wurst.setting.autoeat.min_hu:
Always keeps the hunger bar at or above this level, even if it wastes some hunger points.
6.5 - Cannot cause any waste with vanilla food items.
10.0 - Completely ignores waste and just keeps the hunger bar full.
description.wurst.setting.autoeat.take_i: Where AutoEat should look for food.
description.wurst.setting.autoeat.target: Tries to keep the hunger bar at or above this level, but only if it doesn't waste any hunger points.
description.wurst.setting.autofarm.check: Ensures that you don't reach through blocks when planting and harvesting.
description.wurst.setting.autofarm.face_: How AutoFarm should face the crops when planting and harvesting.
description.wurst.setting.autofarm.swing: How AutoFarm should swing your hand when planting and harvesting.
How AutoLibrarian should face the villager and job site.
How AutoLibrarian should swing your hand when interacting with the villager and job site.
description.wurst.setting.autotrader.bat: Maximum number of items to sell in one continuous run. Useful to limit how many emeralds you collect at once.
description.wurst.setting.autotrader.coo: Cooldown between consecutive purchases (in ms) to be friendly to server timing.
description.wurst.setting.autotrader.ite: List of items to sell automatically. Use the Item List editor to add item IDs or keywords.
description.wurst.setting.autotrader.ret: Number of retry attempts for a single purchase in case the server doesn't respond immediately.
description.wurst.setting.autotrader.use: If enabled AutoTrader will QUICK_MOVE (shift-click) trade results into your inventory for faster collection.
When enabled, AutoTrader will match trades that require two different input items (second buy slot).
description.wurst.setting.buildrandom.fa: How BuildRandom should face the randomly placed blocks.
description.wurst.setting.buildrandom.sw: How BuildRandom should swing your hand when placing blocks.
description.wurst.setting.chattranslator:
Automatically detect the language of received messages.

Useful if other players are using a mix of different languages.

If everyone is using the same language, turning this off can improve accuracy.

Automatically detect the language of sent messages.

Useful if you're using a mix of different languages.

If you're always using the same language, turning this off can improve accuracy.

Won't translate messages that appear to be sent by you.

It tries to detect your messages based on common chat formats like "<name>", "[name]", or "name:". This might not work correctly on some servers.

The main language used by other players on the server.

Your sent messages will always be translated into this language (if enabled).

When "Detect received language" is turned off, all received messages are assumed to be in this language.

The main language that you can use and understand.

Your received messages will always be translated into this language (if enabled).

When "Detect sent language" is turned off, all sent messages are assumed to be in this language.
description.wurst.setting.crystalaura.fa: How CrystalAura should face the end crystals.
description.wurst.setting.crystalaura.sw: How CrystalAura should swing your hand when placing and detonating end crystals.
description.wurst.setting.follow.filter_: Won't follow bats and any other "ambient" mobs that might be added by mods.
Won't follow players that are at least the given distance above ground.
Won't follow iron golems and snow golems.
Won't follow neutral mobs like endermen and wolves.
Won't follow tamed wolves, tamed horses, etc.
Won't follow villagers and wandering traders.
description.wurst.setting.generic.attack:
Attack speed in clicks per second.
0 = dynamically adjusts the speed to match your attack cooldown.
description.wurst.setting.generic.face_t: Face the target by moving your camera on the client-side. This is the most legit option, but can be disorienting to look at.
Don't face the target at all. Will be detected by anti-cheat plugins.
Face the target on the server-side, while still letting you move the camera freely on the client-side.
Face the target on the server-side and send a separate packet every time. Can help with some (broken) anti-cheat plugins but is more likely to just get you kicked.
description.wurst.setting.generic.filter: Won't attack bats and any other "ambient" mobs that might be added by mods.
Won't show bats and any other "ambient" mobs that might be added by mods.

When set to ??lOn??r, endermen won't be attacked at all.

When set to ??lIf calm??r, endermen won't be attacked until they attack first. Be warned that this filter cannot detect if the endermen are attacking you or someone else.

When set to ??lOff??r, this filter does nothing and endermen can be attacked.

When set to ??lOn??r, endermen won't be shown at all.

When set to ??lIf calm??r, endermen won't be shown until they attack something.

When set to ??lOff??r, this filter does nothing and endermen can be shown.

Won't attack players that are at least the given distance above ground.

Useful for servers that try to detect your hacks by placing a flying bot near you.
Won't attack iron golems and snow golems.
Won't show iron golems and snow golems.

When set to ??lOn??r, neutral mobs won't be attacked at all.

When set to ??lIf calm??r, neutral mobs won't be attacked until they attack first. Be warned that this filter cannot detect if the neutral mobs are attacking you or someone else.

When set to ??lOff??r, this filter does nothing and neutral mobs can be attacked.

When set to ??lOn??r, neutral mobs won't be shown at all.

When set to ??lIf calm??r, neutral mobs won't be shown until they attack something.

When set to ??lOff??r, this filter does nothing and neutral mobs can be shown.
Won't attack tamed wolves, tamed horses, etc.
Won't show tamed wolves, tamed horses, etc.

Won't attack sleeping players.

Useful for servers like Mineplex that place sleeping players on the ground to make them look like corpses.
Won't attack villagers and wandering traders.
Won't show villagers and wandering traders.

When set to ??lOn??r, zombified piglins won't be attacked at all.

When set to ??lIf calm??r, zombified piglins won't be attacked until they attack first. Be warned that this filter cannot detect if the zombified piglins are attacking you or someone else.

When set to ??lOff??r, this filter does nothing and zombified piglins can be attacked.

When set to ??lOn??r, zombified piglins won't be shown at all.

When set to ??lIf calm??r, zombified piglins won't be shown until they attack something.

When set to ??lOff??r, this filter does nothing and zombified piglins can be shown.
description.wurst.setting.generic.pause_:
Won't attack while a container screen (chest, hopper, etc.) is open.
Useful for minigame servers that display chest-like menus.
description.wurst.setting.generic.swing_: Swing your hand on the client-side. This is the most legit option.
Don't swing your hand at all. Will be detected by anti-cheat plugins.
Swing your hand on the server-side, without playing the animation on the client-side.
How %s should swing your hand when attacking.
How %s should swing your hand when mining.
description.wurst.setting.invwalk.allow_: Allows you to move around while Wurst's ClickGUI is open.
Allows you to move around while other in-game screens are open (e.g. chest, horse, villager trading), unless the screen has a text box.
description.wurst.setting.kaboom.particl: Whether or not to display explosion particles. Does not affect block breaking. Only you can see the particles.
description.wurst.setting.kaboom.power:
Determines how many sets of block breaking packets will be sent for each block.

Higher values increase your odds of breaking more blocks, but also place additional load on the server. Small servers are likely to crash at the higher values.
description.wurst.setting.kaboom.sound: Whether or not to play an explosion sound. Does not affect block breaking. Only you can hear the sound.
description.wurst.setting.mobspawnesp.da: Color of the X at positions where mobs can always spawn.
description.wurst.setting.mobspawnesp.hi: Makes MobSpawnESP more accurate by ignoring dark spots that are too small for any mobs to spawn, but can also negatively affect performance and/or stability.
Synchronized hitbox check. Shouldn't cause any crashes, but has a large impact on game performance.
Fast but unstable hitbox check. This is known to crash the game sometimes.
description.wurst.setting.mobspawnesp.ni: Color of the X at positions where mobs can spawn at night.
description.wurst.setting.nofall.allow_e:
Also tries to prevent fall damage while you are flying with an elytra.

??c??lWARNING:??r This can sometimes cause you to stop flying unexpectedly.
description.wurst.setting.nofall.pause_f:
Pauses NoFall when holding a mace, so that you can take advantage of the mace's fall distance bonus.

??c??lWARNING:??r You will not be protected from fall damage while you are holding a mace. Also, switching to or away from a mace while you are already falling will interrupt your fall, potentially causing you to take damage.
description.wurst.setting.quickshulker.b: Items listed here are never placed into the temporary shulker box. Applies whether QuickShulker takes items from your inventory or from an opened container (chest, shulker, etc.).
description.wurst.setting.quickshulker.c: If enabled, QuickShulker will continue placing and filling additional shulker boxes to transfer remaining items taken from the opened container.
description.wurst.setting.quickshulker.m: Choose whether QuickShulker targets stackable or non-stackable items.
description.wurst.setting.quickshulker.w: If this list is not empty, only the listed items will be moved into the shulker. Applies to items taken from your inventory or from an opened container.
description.wurst.setting.remoteview.fil: Won't view bats and any other "ambient" mobs that might be added by mods.
Won't view players that are at least the given distance above ground.
Won't view iron golems and snow golems.
Won't view neutral mobs like endermen and wolves.
Won't view tamed wolves, tamed horses, etc.
Won't view villagers and wandering traders.
description.wurst.setting.safetp.command: Command that SafeTP should send when it starts. A leading slash is optional.
description.wurst.setting.safetp.wait_ti: How long Blink should stay active after sending the teleport command.
description.wurst.setting.treebot.face_t: How TreeBot should face the logs and leaves when breaking them.
description.wurst.setting.treebot.swing_: How TreeBot should swing your hand when breaking logs and leaves.
description.wurst.setting.trialspawneres: Distance (meters) at which approaching an ominous vault triggers a state check.
Color used for active/spawning spawners.
Color used for spawners that are priming/waiting for players.
Color used for completed spawners.
Color used for idle spawners.
When observing ACTIVE->COOLDOWN transitions, estimate a cooldown using the spawner's configured cooldown length.
Fill ESP boxes with a translucent color.
Show the number of found spawners in the hack list entry.
Automatically mark ominous vaults as opened if you approach and the vault state does not change.
Maximum distance (meters) at which trial spawners will be detected and rendered.
Color used to render ominous Vault boxes (default: purple).
Scale of the overlay text labels.
Color used to render the activation radius ring.
Draw the spawner's activation radius as a ring on the ground.
Show a cooldown countdown when the spawner is on cooldown (or an estimate if observed).
Show the distance to the spawner in the overlay.
Show the intended mob type for each spawner in the overlay.
Show a countdown to the next mob spawn while the spawner is active.
Show a floating text overlay above each spawner/vault with additional info.
Show a short status line (Idle/Priming/Spawning/Completed) in the overlay.
Draw a tracer line from the spawner to its position.
Show a guessed trial type (Combat / Breeze / Unknown) in the overlay.
Show lines linking spawners to nearby Vault blocks and label the vault state.
Color used to render normal Vault boxes.
Color used for the spawner->vault link lines.
Maximum range for linking a spawner to the nearest vault (meters).
description.wurst.setting.tridentesp.box: Size of the ESP box around tridents.
description.wurst.setting.tridentesp.col: Color tridents based on who threw them (you vs other players).
description.wurst.setting.tridentesp.fix: Color used when 'Use fixed color' is enabled.
description.wurst.setting.tridentesp.inc: Include tridents that are currently held in players' hands in the ESP.
description.wurst.setting.tridentesp.mob: Color used for tridents thrown by mobs.
description.wurst.setting.tridentesp.oth: Color used for tridents thrown by other players.
description.wurst.setting.tridentesp.sel: Color used for tridents thrown by you.
description.wurst.setting.tridentesp.sty: Rendering style for TridentESP (outline, box, etc.).
description.wurst.setting.tridentesp.use: When enabled, always use the fixed color instead of coloring by owner or mob type.
description.wurst.setting.triggerbot.swi: How TriggerBot should swing your hand when attacking. (This setting will be ignored if "Simulate mouse click" is enabled.)
gui.wurst.altmanager.empty.message: Would you like some random alts to get started?
gui.wurst.altmanager.empty.title: Your alt list is empty.
gui.wurst.altmanager.folder_error.messag:
You may have accidentally blocked Wurst from accessing this folder.
AltManager cannot encrypt or decrypt your alt list without it.
You can still use AltManager, but any alts you create now won't be saved.

The full error is as follows:
%s
gui.wurst.nochatreports.unsafe_server.me:
This server requires chat signatures to be enabled, which puts your account at risk of fraudulent chat reports.

You can chat on this server if you un-block chat signatures and then reconnect. If you do, consider playing on an alt account that you don't mind losing.

If this is your server, you can fix this by setting 'enforce-secure-profile' to false in server.properties. In typical Mojang fashion, this setting does the opposite of what it sounds like.
Messages sent on this server may be reported to Big Brother Mojang and might get your account banned globally
description.wurst.hack.coordlogger: Logs coordinates vanilla world events. World events are grouped so you can filter them in the ClickGUI. Events out of range will give directional advice rather than pinpoint coordinates.
